title: Menacing
content:
Menacing Effect You gain proficiency in the Intimidation skill. Requirements Half-Orc

You gain proficiency in the Intimidation skill.

Menacing is a Trait in Baldur's Gate 3. Traits provide unique abilities or effects and can be acquired depending on the Character's Race, Class and level.

Menacing Information

You gain proficiency in the Intimidation skill.

How to unlock Menacing

Menacing can be acquired by: Half-Orc
